name: Findstr GPP Passwords
description: Look for the encrypted cpassword value within Group Policy Preference files on the Domain Controller. This value can be decrypted with gpp-decrypt.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\findstr.exe AND process.command_line:*cpassword* AND process.command_line:*\\sysvol\\* AND process.command_line:*.xml*)`
